content: Phase 1.1: Fix navigation transparency and responsive design issues
Phase 1.2: Migrate from CrewAI to AutoGen AI framework
Phase 1.3: Integrate AG UI Protocol for agent-human interaction
Phase 2.1: Build Risk Management dashboard with real-time analytics
Phase 2.2: Build Vault Banking system with multi-account structure
Phase 2.3: Build Advanced Analytics dashboard with performance breakdown
Phase 3.1: Build Agent Management interface with AutoGen orchestration
Phase 3.2: Build Data Management interface for file operations
Phase 3.3: Create Agent Trading permissions interface
Phase 4.1: Implement real-time WebSocket connections and live data
Phase 4.2: Add export functionality and reporting systems
Phase 4.3: Performance optimization and horizontal scaling
Phase 5.1: Create MCP server registry and management system
Phase 5.2: Create market data MCP servers (Alpaca, AlphaVantage, Financial Datasets)
Phase 5.3: Create trading operations MCP servers
Phase 6.1: Create intelligence MCP servers (Octagon, MongoDB, Neo4j)
Phase 6.2: Implement communication MCP servers (Slack, Telegram)
Phase 6.3: Create DevOps MCP servers (GitHub, Raygun, BigQuery)
Phase 7.1: Activate and test all MCP servers
Phase 7.2: Enhanced security, compliance, and audit logging
Phase 7.3: Final integration testing and production deployment
